entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -38.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 5:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -38.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
